alert.note: Alert for Bates; Cass (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:02AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Miami, Linn, southern Cass and Bates Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 102 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Drexel to near Pleasanton to near Kincaid. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paola, Osawatomie, Butler, Adrian, Garden City, Rich Hill, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Archie, Drexel, Linn Valley, Hume, Parker, Blue Mound, Prescott, Fontana, Amsterdam, Amoret and Foster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for east central Kansas...and west central Missouri.
